casebody.data:
No. 10-8506. Mack W. Thomas, Petitioner v. Ari Zavaras, Executive Director, Colorado Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1247, 131 S. Ct. 1544,

179 L. Ed. 2d 355,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1218. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 392 Fed. Appx. 638.
